resources.string: Signal-Iduna-Park is the stadium of Borussia Dortmund. Until 2005 it was famous as Westfalenstadion. With 80.720 seats it is the largest stadium in Germany in matches of the German Bundesliga. At the FIFA World Cup 2006 several matches took place in it including two of the German national team. Since 2009 you can also find a museum called Borusseum.
